description:
Summon powerful monsters left and right. Turn the tide with countless draws. Rush Duels aren’t over until the very last card is played!

• A dynamic new way to play Yu-Gi-Oh! featuring new cards, mechanics and monsters
• Collect cards, build up your deck and become a RUSH DUEL champion!
• Take on a single-player campaign featuring an original Yu-Gi-Oh! story
• Battle against friends and challengers in thrilling two-player Duels
• Face off against Duelists in local play or online play – it’s time to RUSH DUEL!
name: Yu-Gi-Oh! RUSH DUEL: Dawn of the Battle Royale!!
